## Forage Fish

Some text...

```{r rvc-black-grouper, layout="l-screen-inset", fig.height=2}
library(tidyverse)
library(dygraphs)
library(xts)
library(lubridate)
library(glue)

csv <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/marinebon/info-fk/master/prep/data/rvc_exploited_species/exploited_fk_den.csv"

d <- read_csv(csv)

dd <- d %>% 
  filter(common_name == "Black_Grouper") %>% 
  mutate(
    yr_date = as_date(glue("{YEAR}-06-15"))) %>% 
  select(yr_date, density_mean, protected_status) %>% 
  spread(protected_status, density_mean, fill=0)
  
select(dd, -yr_date) %>%
  as.xts(order.by=dd$yr_date) %>%
  dygraph(main="Black Grouper Density") 
```

## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
plot(pressure)
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
